info.title: IRN API v1
info.description: Allows users to extract, create, update and configure IRN data.

get.summary: Get all the meetings in the specified date range filtered on the given identifiers

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description: Set of identifiers to filter on

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit on the number of meetings retrieved

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Only return meetings which have been modified or created since a particular time

parameters.name: includeRelatedEntities
parameters.description: When set to true fetches meetings tagged with all the entities related to identifiers param

parameters.name: X-IRN-Include-Deleted
parameters.description: Includes deleted meetings in results when set to true

requestBody.description: Note: The organizer property is deprecated in favor of organizerId

201.description: Success - Returns unique identifier of the meeting created

requestBody.description: Meeting details to update. Note: The organizer property is deprecated in favor of organizerId

get.summary: Get all the attachments belonging to a meeting

post.summary: Create an attachment for a existing meeting

201.description: Success - Returns unique identifier of the Attachment

get.summary: Download an attachment from a Meeting
Get all comments for a meeting

post.summary: Create a comment to a Meeting

get.summary: Get details of a comment belonging to a meeting

patch.summary: Edit a comment for a meeting

delete.summary: Delete a Comment from a Meeting

get.summary: Get attachments summary of a comment belonging to a meeting

post.summary: Create a comment attachment to a Meeting

get.summary: Download single attachment detail of a comment belonging to a meeting
Get all the record events that belong to a meeting
Get details of a record event of a meeting

CreateCustomFieldValueDto.description:
Set a value or values for a custom field identified by the field 'Code'. Only one of the fields (IntegerValue / TextValue / FilePathValue etc) will be used,
depending on the data type of the custom field corresponding to the 'Code' provided
